p: In the face of the current pandemic, it is recommended to optimize coverage of healthy children and adults with influenza and pneumococcal vaccinations to mitigate the effects of community-acquired pneumonia. 27 The same vaccination strategy is strongly recommended for the majority of patients with autoimmune inflammatory rheumatic diseases prior to the administration of immunosuppressive therapy. 28 However, there are no studies suggesting the cross-resistance to SARS-CoV-2 in individuals vaccinated against influenza or pneumococcal pneumonia.
